title: Deployer duty: inform workers/representatives before workplace use

article_refs.quote: Before putting into service or using a high-risk AI system at the workplace, deployers who are employers shall inform workers’ representatives and the affected workers ...

legal_consequence.verbatim: Before putting into service or using a high-risk AI system at the workplace, deployers who are employers shall inform workers’ representatives and the affected workers that they will be subject to the use of the high-risk AI system.

items.label: Information rules
items.text: Provide information in accordance with Union/national law and practice on worker information and representatives.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
